name: Zorrbabe
text: I am sorry to say to tell everybody this location has closed down I think they were going to make a speedy place bigger. It is a pure shame because I have had many good times here eating a salad bar and getting their various deals and it was a great family atmosphere. Bad decision to close this place.

name: Dianne Griese
text: My 2 friends and I go here at least 1 time a week.  Buffet is wonderful and Rachel and cook are the best.  I do agree it does need updating.  Loved when they had the place mats.  Just makes it feel more clean.  Love the rewards program.

name: Shawnee Ackley
text: Ordered a mushroom pan pizza, very delicious. Restaurant could use a facelift, but it's an older location so it's understandable. The dining area was clean and tidy. Waitress was very friendly and left a smiley face and a hand written thank you on our bill which was refreshing. Will definitely return.

name: Am3lia
text: Walked in there. no one was in sight so my family and I walked in automatically to place and order.  While placing the order another employee said well if you are dining in you need to be seated then we will take your order. and then …More

name: vicc
text: Was just in for a large pep pizza taste very dank.  lady was super friendly and made sure my order was correct. I reccomend this location

name: Camille Evans
text: I'm very impressed by the changes that have been made under the new ownership. Much cleaner location, friendly staff & the newly implemented lunch buffet was excellent! We will be visiting much more often now.

name: Penny Potter
text: The evening crew here at this pizza hut is outstanding!!  They are extremely friendly. Provide quick and accurate service. And the pizza is great! …More

name: Paul Jones
text: Food and service are excellent. Some of the staff at this location were from the vestal location that closed in 2017. Definitely recommend this restaurant.

name: Adam Antine
text: Our server was fantastic and cheerful and very attentive. The buffet pizza choices were standard for the buffet. Salad bar was well stocked.

name: MariyamFatima Aali
text: Good Food. Good Service. Our server patty was v nice. We all loved the cheesesticks and pizza. Thank u.

name: Anna James
text: Terrible. Spaghetti and meatballs were cold. Wings were warm at best. The cheesey garlic bread was good.

name: phoenix songbird
text: I stopped by here last night with my fiancee and his mom while we were driving home. We figured let's stop at a Pizza Hut since we know what the food is like. The food was great! The waitress was amazing. She was very friendly and sweet and …More

name: Katherine Stecyk
text: Sad to see you go. We will kiss all the staff. Great place to go.

name: Darlene Laskowsky
text: I ordered a large sausage, hand tossed crust pizza tonight and got a really thin like saltine cracker crust. It cost $18.53 and was the size of a medium pizza from Grande’s. The price for that little thin dry pizza was ridiculous. Never, ever order a pizza there. I feel robbed and taken advantage of.

name: Sarah Labuz
text: Always good food and good service.

name: Paul Jones
text: Great friendly service and the food is awesome!

name: John Borovicka
text: Good pizza, friendly staff.

name: Justin Law
text: very dirty tables are Stickey seats are the same service is terrible. time to update or close down. don't recommend eating here

name: William Johnson
text: Bathroom looked worse than an independent garage toilet smelled horrible food wasnt bad

name: Misty Harper
text: Was good,and staff very pleasant.

name: Chris Bacon
text: All the 3 hour old food you can eat...  Enjoy

name: Kevin Martin
text: This location is run down and needs updating terribly. Building is falling apart. If this is a franchise owner pizza hut needs to step in. If its not shame on corporate.

name: matt keane
text: Not excited about the new EXTRA $1.00 CHARGE on all the PAN PIZZAS. Is this what it's come down to? I mean really... :(

name: Elizabeth Pena
text: Dirty PIZZA HUT you need to update your locations they are stuck in the early 90s and may have been the last time any have been properly cleaned offerings in salad bar are non existent - friendly staff but the place smells moldy and is dirty to the eye pretty easily.

name: Misty Harper
text: They since have closed, now no place delivers to us.

name: jack b
text: food is very good the buffet is great come there alot but service is horrible i order a pizza wait an hour and they said they dont deliver and they hung up horrible place if you want bad atmossphere

name: Marissa McConnell
text: Favorite place to get pizza. It has a small kids area to play while waiting for food.

name: Leslie Haddad
text: every time I order from this location it takes twice as long as they tell me and then they f up my order....... very disappointed.  have given them too many opportunities to redeem themselves and still end up with something other than what I ordered.

name: Joseph Maxwell
text: Pizza and service is mediocre

name: Melody Terboss
text:
Bad. The quality has gone down hill the
crust is hard and obviously  has been out  drying before being used to make the crust

name: Rylee Lum
text: Very dirty

name: Brandon Kenyon
text: Okay restaurant needs updating
